- Initial version.

## 0.0.2

## 0.0.3

- Remove `dependencies` export.

## 0.0.4

- Upgraded to newer `dependencies:0.0.5` api.

## 0.1.0

- Stable API.

## 0.1.1

- Dispose injector when the widget is disposed.
